# AVCaptureSession.Preset

**Structure**

Presets that define standard configurations for a capture session.

## Declaration

```swift
struct Preset
```

## Discussion

Setting a [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureSession/sessionPreset] value provides a convenient way to configure a capture session for common use cases.

## Quality levels

- **high**: A preset suitable for capturing high-quality output.
- **medium**: A preset suitable for capturing medium-quality output.
- **low**: A preset suitable for capturing low-quality output.

## Photo

- **photo**: A preset suitable for capturing high-resolution photo quality output.

## Manual configuration

- **inputPriority**: A preset that doesn’t specify audio and video output settings for a capture session.

## High definition

- **qHD960x540**: A preset suitable for capturing quarter HD quality (960 x 540 pixel) video output.
- **hd1280x720**: A preset suitable for capturing 720p quality (1280 x 720 pixel) video output.
- **hd1920x1080**: A preset suitable for capturing 1080p-quality (1920 x 1080 pixels) video output.
- **hd4K3840x2160**: A preset suitable for capturing 2160p-quality (3840 x 2160 pixels) video output.

## VGA

- **qvga320x240**: A preset suitable for capturing 320 x 240 pixel video output.
- **vga640x480**: A preset suitable for capturing VGA quality (640 x 480 pixel) video output.

## iFrame

- **iFrame960x540**: A preset suitable for capturing 960 x 540 quality iFrame H.264 video at about 30 Mbits/sec with AAC audio.
- **iFrame1280x720**: A preset suitable for capturing 1280 x 720 quality iFrame H.264 video at about 40 Mbits/sec with AAC audio.

## CIF

- **cif352x288**: A preset suitable for capturing CIF quality (352 x 288 pixel) video output.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a preset with a string value.

## Setting a session preset

- **canSetSessionPreset(_:)**: Determines whether you can configure a capture session with the specified preset.
- **sessionPreset**: A preset value that indicates the quality level or bit rate of the output.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
